extendedInfo.description: The most beautiful quotes and sayings about mothers on this Mother's Day. Find beautiful, heart touching, inspirational, realistic quotes, proverbs, sayings from famous people, words of wisdom, and more... Search for ideas to write and dedicate to your mother.Build your own mother's day cards using our most meaningful words.Find inspiration for poems, greetings cards...Quotes for Father's Day here: goo.gl/IYZvwEverything for Mom, the most special person who cares and loves you. She deserves the best words that describe your love and feeling, not only on this day... every single day!Share quotes through the applications installed on your phone (Facebook, Twitter, SMS, email)Extras: quotes from iconic and representative people like: Abraham Lincoln, Oprah Winfrey, Oscar Wilde, Victor Hugo, Whitney Houston, and more.Happy Mother's Day!tags: mother, mothers day, mom, momther, happy mothers day , mom's day , mom sayings, mother sayings, beatiful, greatful, motivation, read inspiring and motivational quotes, mother care, mother love, mom says, grandmother, may 12, mi mama dice, madre, mama, dia de las madres, emotions, inspiration, inspirational, frases madres, bonitas, dulces, tarjetas para madres, regalo madre, frases, poemas,

reviews.title: Awesome! 20 ****
reviews.comment: It\'s about time!!! I searched through so many just plain STUPID  app\'s . Then Finally came to this nugget  of gold. It\'s  heartwarming, and very easy to use. So many Good ones I had to send afew.
reviews.author: doris hall
